items.question: What is ODOIS?
items.answer: ODOIS is a modular SaaS platform that works as an operating system for business. You activate only the modules you need — CRM, Scheduling, Payments, WhatsApp, and more — paying only for what you use.

items.question: Do I need to activate all modules?
items.answer: Not at all! That's the beauty of ODOIS. Start with what you need and activate new modules as your business grows. No waste.

items.question: Can I customize it with my brand?
items.answer: Yes! ODOIS is fully white-label. You can customize colors, logo, domain, and the entire visual identity. Your customers only see your brand.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption, robust authentication, automatic backups, and a multi-tenant architecture with complete data isolation. GDPR and LGPD compliant.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! The Free plan is free forever with basic CRM. Paid plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Billing is monthly or annual (with a discount). You pay for the plan you choose and can upgrade or downgrade at any time.

items.question: Can I migrate from another platform?
items.answer: Yes! We offer data import via CSV and API. Our support team helps with the migration process at no additional cost.

items.question: Do you have an API for integrations?
items.answer: Yes! ODOIS is API-first. All features are available via a documented REST API, making it easy to integrate with any system.

items.question: How does support work?
items.answer: We offer email support on all plans, priority support on Starter and Pro plans, and 24/7 support with a dedicated SLA on the Enterprise plan.

items.question: Does ODOIS work on mobile devices?
items.answer: Yes! The platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on smartphones and tablets — no app installation required.
